metadata.description: Version configuration for AI Environment Python System files

setup_python_env.bat.search_pattern: Setup Python Environment for AI Environment Manager v3.0.16

src/ai_process_manager.py.description: Background process manager with enhanced VS Code integration

src/ai_app_launcher.py.description: Application launcher with VS Code AI2025 interpreter setup

src/ai_component_tester.py.description: Component testing module with comprehensive tests for new model management and Jupyter Lab systems

src/ai_action_handlers.py.description: Action handlers module with comprehensive AI model management integration

src/ai_jupyter_manager.py.description: Jupyter Lab management module with improved server startup logic and error handling

src/check_versions.py.description: Version checker with dynamic highest version display

src/verify_checksums.py.description: File integrity verification using SHA256 checksums (internal module)

changes: Fixed Jupyter Lab server startup logic and detection issues
Improved error handling and debugging information in start_server_only method
Added conda path validation before attempting to start server
Enhanced error messages with detailed output from failed server starts
Fixed duplicate exception handlers in server startup code
Added better timeout handling for process communication
Improved server detection logic to properly handle already running servers
Fixed terminal hanging issue after Jupyter Lab server shutdown
Added proper stdin handling to subprocess calls in _kill_processes_on_port
Added input buffer flushing after stop_server operation
Fixed subprocess interference with parent process input stream
Added capture_output=True and stdin=subprocess.DEVNULL to all subprocess calls
Added small delay and buffer flush to ensure clean terminal state
Improved error handling for subprocess.CalledProcessError in process termination
Fixed UnboundLocalError in ai_action_handlers.py handle_launch_menu method
Fixed Jupyter Lab option 3 (Start Server + Client) with improved timing and error handling
Fixed Jupyter Lab option 6 (Stop Server) with better process termination and graceful shutdown
Added Projects directory targeting - server opens in D:\AI_Environment\Projects\01_Basic_LLM_Example
Enhanced background process management for Jupyter Lab server
Improved server startup verification with timeout and status checking
Added better error messages and user feedback for Jupyter Lab operations
Enhanced graceful shutdown with requests API and fallback to process termination
Fixed BackgroundProcessManager method call error
Changed list_processes() to list_background_processes() in ai_action_handlers.py
Fixed AttributeError when accessing background process management menu
Improved background process management functionality
Fixed version display to show highest system version dynamically
Added current time to date display in AI Environment Manager header
Updated activate_ai_env.py to dynamically determine highest version from JSON
Updated check_versions.py to show correct highest system version
Improved version consistency across all components
Enhanced user experience with accurate version information
Fixed directory structure test - made AI_Installer and AI_Environment_Python optional
Fixed pandas timeout issue - increased timeout from 5 to 15 seconds
Improved Ollama version check with fallback to --help command
Added better error reporting for Ollama test failures
Enhanced component testing reliability and user experience
Fixed ImportError: cannot import name 'ProcessManager' from 'ai_process_manager'
Corrected import statement to use 'BackgroundProcessManager' instead of 'ProcessManager'
Updated all references from ProcessManager() to BackgroundProcessManager(self.ai_env_path)
Fixed runtime error in background process management functionality
Ensured proper class name consistency and parameter passing
Fixed ImportError: cannot import name 'AppLauncher' from 'ai_app_launcher'
Corrected import statement to use 'ApplicationLauncher' instead of 'AppLauncher'
Updated all references from AppLauncher to ApplicationLauncher in ai_action_handlers.py
Fixed runtime error that prevented AI Environment from starting
Ensured proper class name consistency across modules
Fixed direct Python execution guidance in check_versions.py
Added warning when running check_versions.py directly instead of via .bat
Updated version display to show highest system version from configuration
Added function to extract and display highest version number
Improved user guidance for proper launch methods
Enhanced version reporting with both script and system versions
Reorganized file structure: moved all Python files to src/ directory
Root directory now contains only Windows batch files for user interaction
Moved check_versions.py and verify_checksums.py to src/ as internal modules
Updated check_versions.bat to be a simple wrapper calling src/check_versions.py
Improved file organization following Windows/Python separation principle
Updated all file paths and references in configuration
Added environment check in activate_ai_env.py to detect incorrect launch method
Script now warns users when run directly outside conda AI2025 environment
Added clear guidance to use run_ai_env.bat instead of direct Python execution
Improved user experience with proper launch method instructions
Added option to continue with limited functionality if user insists
Moved activate_ai_env.py to src/ directory as internal module
Updated run_ai_env.bat to reference src/activate_ai_env.py
Improved file organization - only user-facing files in root directory
Fixed circular checksum dependency issue in verify_checksums.py
CHECKSUMS.sha256 no longer includes its own checksum to prevent infinite loop
Updated verify_checksums.py to focus only on AI Environment files
Improved checksum verification to ignore system installations (VS Code, Miniconda)
Updated PACKAGE_INFO.txt with corrected version information
Major version update: All files updated to version 3.0.0
Unified version numbering across all components
Complete system refresh with consistent versioning
All modules, scripts, and configuration files synchronized
Updated configuration to use original filenames as preferred by user
check_versions.bat now contains the dynamic version checker functionality
activate_ai_env.py now contains the refactored modular code
Simplified file structure while maintaining all functionality
Fixed Python syntax error in dynamic version checker
Corrected f-string parentheses mismatch in temp_json_parser.py generation
Fixed missing closing quotes in description field parsing
Created dynamic version checker that reads all files from JSON configuration
Fixed hardcoded file list issue in check_versions.bat
Added Python-based JSON parsing for accurate file detection
Now checks all files defined in version_config.json automatically
Major refactoring: Split large activate_ai_env.py into focused modules
Created ai_component_tester.py for comprehensive testing functionality
Created ai_menu_system.py for interactive menu interfaces
Created ai_action_handlers.py for all menu actions and operations
Created activate_ai_env_refactored.py as new streamlined main entry point
Improved code organization and maintainability
Implemented comprehensive Test All Components functionality
Added 6 comprehensive tests: directory structure, conda, AI2025 env, packages, Ollama, system integration
Added detailed test results with pass/fail counts and success rate
Added support for optional components (Ollama)
Enhanced error reporting and debugging information
Fixed Python path verification logic with better string matching
Added multiple path pattern support (forward/backward slashes)
Enhanced path normalization for Windows compatibility
Added debug information for path verification failures
Fixed Full Activation process order - conda first, then path cleanup
Improved PATH manager to preserve essential Windows commands
Enhanced Python location verification with fallback methods
Fixed command testing in PATH manager

changes: Initial release of AI Environment Python System
Complete portable AI development environment
Integrated Conda, Ollama, and Jupyter Lab
Automated setup and activation scripts
Fixed circular checksum issue in CHECKSUMS.sha256
Improved checksum verifier to focus on AI Environment files only
Updated version tracking and documentation
Added proper verbose mode support
Fixed Windows path compatibility
Fixed Jupyter Lab option 3 (Start Server + Client) - server now runs in background
Fixed Jupyter Lab option 6 (Stop Server) - improved process termination with fallback
Added Projects directory targeting - server opens in D:\AI_Environment\Projects\01_Basic_LLM_Example
Enhanced background process management for Jupyter Lab server
Improved error handling and graceful shutdown mechanisms
Implemented comprehensive AI model management system
Added model download, load, status, delete, and help functions
Created detailed help files for all popular AI models (Phi, Llama2, Mistral, CodeLlama, GPT-OSS)
Integrated model selection into Full Activation with phi:2.7b as default
Added models/ directory with complete documentation and usage examples
Enhanced action handlers with full model management integration
Added official download links and Python usage examples for all models
Fixed folder name from models/ to help/ for better organization
Fixed Unicode encoding issues in model loading (UnicodeDecodeError)
Extended timeout for large models from 2 to 5 minutes
Added proper encoding='utf-8' and errors='replace' to all subprocess calls
Improved error messages for large model loading failures
Updated all references from models_help_path to help_path

version_history.description: Comprehensive testing and VS Code integration complete
changes: All new modules tested and verified in sandbox environment
ModelLoader functionality confirmed with help system
ComponentTester enhanced with 9 comprehensive tests
VS Code workspace setup tested and working
Main.py auto-creation tested and functional
All imports verified and working correctly
Unicode and timeout fixes confirmed working
Help system with 5 model files tested
